channel.title: Help with the values please
channel.description:
Hey, i've got a little problem here. The base is matrix 718 and onwent with panic-pvp. (Matrix 718 tbh)
There's some things i'd like to have changed. Item droppings - how to get it enabled? Item values - Not shop prices, but the prices when people die in wildy, and which items to keep. how to change those values, as dharok etc. are 800k a piece, and claws are 342k. Dharok keeps over the Claws. - i've changed it in shop.java - (added new price loader as prices.java didn't load correctly), but it still doesn't change those values from 800k to 200k etc. And last thing is i can't add some items to the shops in my server. i've added various items to the shops, but i'm unable to add Dharok gear in the shops. and i'd like to know why, because it frustrates me. it's loading from some economyprices or something, but nothing with such a name in the source. is it in the cache, and would i need to use a cache editor, to obtain the needed information to do this?
Also - adding Drops to NPC's - Cache editing, or which .java file? - Do not need to go into details just the basic "overhead" subject.
Thanks in advance. - Random dude4

item.title: Help with the values please
item.dc:creator: @random_dude4 random dude4
item.description:
@random_dude4 wrote:

Hey, i’ve got a little problem here.
The base is matrix 718 and onwent with panic-pvp. (Matrix 718 tbh)

There’s some things i’d like to have changed.
Item droppings - how to get it enabled?
Item values - Not shop prices, but the prices when people die in wildy, and which items to keep. how to change those values, as dharok etc. are 800k a piece, and claws are 342k. Dharok keeps over the Claws. - i’ve changed it in shop.java - (added new price loader as prices.java didn’t load correctly), but it still doesn’t change those values from 800k to 200k etc.
And last thing is i can’t add some items to the shops in my server. i’ve added various items to the shops, but i’m unable to add Dharok gear in the shops. and i’d like to know why, because it frustrates me. it’s loading from some economyprices or something, but nothing with such a name in the source. is it in the cache, and would i need to use a cache editor, to obtain the needed information to do this?

Also - adding Drops to NPC’s - Cache editing, or which .java file? - Do not need to go into details just the basic “overhead” subject.

Thanks in advance.

  • Random dude4
